sentences.sContent: “While that percentage has increased from 9.5 percent in 1986, it is clear that women are still underrepresented in this realm of academia,” AAUW said in a press release.
sentences.sCn: 美国高校妇女联合会在一份新闻简报中表示："尽管这一比例高于1986年时的9.5%，但女性在学术界的这一领域显然没有得到充分的代表。

trans.tranOther: insufficiently represented or spoken on behalf of
